      • getDeferredChoiceID

        public java.lang.String getDeferredChoiceID()
        Returns:
        the deferred choice UID for this group (if any) - may be null

      • getRandomCompositeTaskFromGroup

        public YCompositeTask getRandomCompositeTaskFromGroup()
        YAWL semantics are that if there is more than one composite task enabled by a condition, one must be non-deterministically chosen to fire.
        Returns:
        null if there are no composite tasks in this group, the only composite task if there is one, or a randomly chosen one if there are several

      • getRandomEmptyTaskFromGroup

        public YAtomicTask getRandomEmptyTaskFromGroup()
        Returns:
        as above, except for empty tasks instead of composites
